ground_truth_bugs.description: Context/log propagation bug in Delete - uses d.Log instead of enriched log variable
DeleteCollection goroutine uses recordStorageDuration instead of recordLegacyDuration
Create failure calls recordLegacyDuration instead of recordStorageDuration
Update failure calls recordLegacyDuration instead of recordStorageDuration
Delete success uses name instead of options.Kind for metric label (cardinality explosion)

golden_metrics.notes: Golden comment 2 ('recordLegacyDuration when storage operation fails') is vague but covers both Create (bug 3) and Update (bug 4) bugs as they share the same pattern

golden_missed_details.description: DeleteCollection goroutine uses recordStorageDuration instead of recordLegacyDuration for legacy operation
golden_missed_details.reasoning: Golden only mentioned the 'recordLegacyDuration when storage fails' pattern but did not identify the inverse problem: calling recordStorageDuration for legacy operations
